extendedInfo.description: A simple Notepad application for when you just need to jot something down! Optimized for Honeycomb tablets, with all your notes readily available. * Simple interface for easy note-taking* Auto-saving functionality so you don't lose your important notes* Notes sorted by most recently updated* Share via Email or other supported applications* No syncing capabilities yet!Tags: notepad, notes app, notes, honeycomb tablet, tablet notes, notebook, tab notes, quick notes

reviews.title: Perfect and simple
reviews.comment: Love how simple and clear this is - completely functional, just the best. I looked for ages, this is just what I wanted - thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does Exactly What I Need
reviews.comment: Bought my first Android item, Motorola Xoom in mid-2011, and this was about the 3rd one I tried (writing this in May 2013 - \'bout time, I know). With so many notepad-type apps out there, I suppose I could have checked them all to be fair to all the budding developers out there - but just not enough time, you know?.  Stopped looking when I tried this, because it works so well, and simple!
reviews.author: David Homan

reviews.title: Great Notepad App
reviews.comment: Works very well with my new Nexus 7 and does exactly what its supposed to do without the ads and the ILLEGAL privacy intrusion of collecting data and sharing your personal info. This is what 5 STAR APPS SHOULD BE MADE OF. FOCUSED ON THE FUNCTIONALITY OF THE APP AND NOT ON COLLECTING USERS INFO. A DEFINITE DOWNLOAD PEOPLE.
reviews.author: WL Morris

reviews.title: Found a bug
reviews.comment: Bug: Overwrites my new notes with an old one, even shares the same name. Ex: Note 1 - Content 1 Note 2 - Content 2 Close program Upon opening later: Note 1 - Content 1 Note 1 - Content 1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Splendid!
reviews.comment: Works great, good work. A little more customization would be nice though : )
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just Perfect
reviews.comment: As stated, it just does what it needs to do. Doesn\'t try to be all things to all people (Springpad, Catch, etc.). This is just great for taking actual notes! Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: I looked at and tried many different notebook type apps but this one was exactly what I wanted. Very simple, easy to use. It keeps a table of contents on the left. You can easily add and edit notes. Each note auto saves. You can share and send to Drop Box, Pocket, etc. A link on my tablet desktop takes me right to it, and within seconds I\'m jotting down something I need to when I\'m in a hurry.  Very solid and dependable on my Acer Iconia Tab.
reviews.author: Susan Brown

reviews.title: So beautiful
reviews.comment: Love its interference but I want a features of saving my text files in my external sd card, background themes, fonts styles, and save text files as Pdf too.After all its a good notepad
reviews.author: Jangila Brahma

reviews.title: Simple and Clean
reviews.comment: The perfect note pad for your Tablet. No unnecessary bells and whistles. Just a nice clean easy to use application that does all I want it to do. Take notes! Thanks for this awesome app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Tablet Notepad App
reviews.comment: I installed this app on my Nexus 7 because I was looking for a notepad app that didn\'t need permissions. I am quite impressed with how this app works and how it looks. It is simple and that is exactly what I needed/wanted. The only thing that bothers me about this app is that it makes you always have at least one note, but this is a minor complaint so I didn\'t take any stars off because of this.
reviews.author: Timothy Mills

reviews.title: Amazingly useful, easy to use
reviews.comment: This app should come with every Android tablet. It\'s perfect for any situation where you want to quickly record a few notes for yourself. Shopping lists, todo lists, ideas, things to remember, recommendations from friends, etc. It has a nice, clean interface, autosaves your typing, and allows easy sharing by email or other sharing methods (depending on which other apps you have). And no ads!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple but perfect
reviews.comment: Its just what I needed! Nothing more nothing less. Also it does not ask for special permissions such as location that I saw in the other notepads. Its so amazingly simple!
reviews.author: Shalp Dhot

reviews.title: Simple and effective!
reviews.comment: Does what it says on the tin. Already installed on my Samsung Galaxy Tab.
reviews.author: Everton Porter

reviews.comment: Thanks for creating this app! No silly permissions and privacy issues.. thanks a million!
reviews.author: Sol Santos

reviews.title: Very nice app
reviews.comment: Great App. Should come by default. KISS Logic (Keep It Small and Simple)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Iconia a500
reviews.comment: Greatest notes app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Does exactly what its supposed to do - lack of sync is annoying though, but keep up the great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yes
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says, simple, and no crazy permissions
reviews.author: AZ WZ

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Simple and useful application.
reviews.author: A Google User
